instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1278: What is A1278? A1278 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook or Macbook Pro Unibody from years Late 2008, Mid 2009, Mid 2010, Early 2011, Late 2011, Mid 2012 with EMC 2254, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2327, 820-2530, 820-2879, 820-2936, 820-3115..
definitions.820-2936: What is 820-2936? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SDA: What is SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SDA? SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SDA is the clock line of an I2C data line between the battery charging chip that creates PPBUS_G3H, the system management controller(SMC), the battery, and the battery indicator LED..
definitions.ISL6259: What is ISL6259? This is a charging chip for Macbook motherboards from 2010 through 2015.
definitions.R7052: What is R7052? Current sense resistor between battery current sense shunt resistor and ISL6259. When these resistors fail the ISL6259 cannot gauge how much current is being sent to or drawn from the battery, which will cause the ISL6259 to stop drawing/sending power to the battery as a safety precaution. Symptoms are low voltage on PPBUS_G3H, quarter fan spin, boot looping, or battery not charging..

threads.title: [SOLVED]<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a green light always on not orange
threads.message:
Hi Louis Hi everybody,nice job here.Congratulations.My name is John and i am chip level engineer in Greece.I am working 5 years mostly on laptop repairs and less on mobiles.
Lately we have some apple machines for repair and i am troubleshooting on some <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> i got with the same problem.Laptop power on but not charging.Green light only is on.Orange never appear.
I have replaced charger ic measured all resistor arround and voltages there are fine.<SIGNAL>SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SDA</SIGNAL> and SCL pulses exists <CHIP>U6900</CHIP> <CHIP>U6901</CHIP> voltages there are fine.I believe that this is maybe SMC problem
but how possible can this be?all other functions of smc be ok except data with battery and charger.i appreaciate any help can be givven.
Regards
John

threads.title: [SOLVED]<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a green light always on not orange
threads.message: Is the battery recognized in OSX? Does the battery indictor blink when you press the button?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a green light always on not orange
threads.message:
hi.
Battery indicator lights respond with correct battery capacity.In osx is also recognized with correct capacity and drain normally.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a green light always on not orange
threads.message:
First thing put the original BIOS back! 
Measure resistance between the pins of <CHIP>ISL6259</CHIP> between 17/18 and 27/28.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a green light always on not orange
threads.message: hi sir thank you for your fast reply.It is very important for me.    resistance between 17and 18pins is 1.07kohm  and 27-28 is 21.3ohm . bios programmed to original
